extendedProjectWizard.meta.title: Extended Configurator
extendedProjectWizard.notAuthorized.titl: You must be logged in to use the extended project configurator
extendedProjectWizard.notAuthorized.teas: Don't have an account yet? You can register here...
extendedProjectWizard.wizard.title: Extended
extendedProjectWizard.wizard.teaser: You get the full project configurator experience here in the extended wizard. If you wish, you can enter all details of the upcoming project here. Define features, structure and design, as well as content for each page or special requests. Projects captured here can be commissioned directly, and results are available in record time.
getStarted.meta.title: Start your project
getStarted.meta.description: Start your project with our configurator.
getStarted.hero.title: Start your
getStarted.teaser.description: Choose the right configurator to start your project and get a first estimate.
getStarted.benefits.fast.title: Fast
getStarted.benefits.fast.description: Get a first estimate in just a few minutes.
getStarted.benefits.transparent.title: Transparent
getStarted.benefits.transparent.descript: Full cost control and clear overview of services.
getStarted.benefits.precise.title: Precise
getStarted.benefits.documentation.title: Documented
getStarted.benefits.documentation.descri: All steps and decisions are recorded.
getStarted.cta.title: Ready?
getStarted.cta.description: Choose your configurator now and get started!
getStarted.wizardSelection.basicConfigur: Quickly get an approximate price estimate. The Basic Configurator can serve as a first indicator and is done in 1 minute.
getStarted.wizardSelection.advancedConfi: Capture your entire project in detail. Manage the result in your personal dashboard.
getStarted.registrationPrompt.title: Please register
getStarted.registrationPrompt.descriptio: Would you like to configure your project in detail and make it more concrete? To use the advanced wizard and save your project, please create an account.
This will give you access to your personal dashboard, where you can manage multiple projects. Your email address is sufficient for registration.

wizard.steps.step1.teaser: Choose the type of your project. This selection determines the available options in the following steps.
wizard.steps.step2.teaser: Choose the appropriate variant for your project. Each option has different features and prices.
wizard.steps.step3.teaser: The more detailed you describe your project, the more accurately we can calculate a price for you.
wizard.steps.step4.teaser: Select all the features you want. Each feature expands the possibilities of your project and affects the price.
wizard.steps.step5.teaser: Define the structure and content of your project. This information helps us with planning and implementation.
wizard.steps.step5.content.pages.title: Pages/Sections
wizard.steps.step5.content.pages.descrip: What pages or sections should your website have? Also describe the desired content for each page.
wizard.steps.step6.teaser: Define the visual appearance of your project. These settings determine the look and feel.
wizard.steps.stepMaterials.teaser: Upload relevant documents, specifications or other materials that help us with implementation.
wizard.steps.stepMaterials.files.title: Documents
wizard.steps.stepMaterials.files.descrip: Upload specifications, wireframes, existing documentation or other relevant files.
wizard.steps.stepMaterials.files.formats: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG, AI, PSD, TXT, XLSX, PPTX
wizard.steps.stepSummary.teaser: Review your configuration. You can return to previous steps at any time to make changes.
wizard.steps.stepSummary.pdfGeneration.e: Error creating PDF. Please try again.
wizard.steps.stepSummary.disclaimer: Nonbinding estimate. The final price will be determined after a personal conversation.
wizard.steps.stepSummary.fontPreview: Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Reiciendis minima officia eveniet fugiat ad dicta quia optio quod possimus sint enim doloremque, consectetur ut est quibusdam corporis obcaecati dolore dolores!
wizard.steps.stepSummary.priceTiers.tier: This is manageable. We can almost certainly offer the lowest price.
A few features have been selected, but the complexity is still moderate: mid-range price.
The project is not trivial. There are several requested features. We are at the upper end.
What you have in mind is quite demanding. Many or very complex features are included. We will likely need the full range and may even be slightly above it.
wizard.steps.priceTiers.tier1.message: Your project is manageable, we are certainly at the lower end of the price range.
wizard.steps.priceTiers.tier2.message: Your project is well feasible, the price is in the middle range.
wizard.steps.priceTiers.tier3.message: Your project is demanding, the price is in the upper range.
wizard.steps.priceTiers.tier4.message: Oh, that's a lot you're asking for. We're certainly above XXX€.
wizard.design.colorSchemeDescription: Select the main colors for your project. If you already have corporate colors, enter them here.
wizard.design.fontDescription: Select a font from our selection or specify your corporate font.
wizard.design.otherGoogleFonts: I'd rather use a different Google Font
wizard.design.customFontPlaceholder: e.g. Helvetica Neue, Arial, Corporate Font Name...
wizard.design.fontPreview: Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Reiciendis minima officia eveniet fugiat ad dicta quia optio quod!
wizard.content.pages.pageNamePlaceholder: e.g. Home, About us, Contact, Services...
wizard.content.pages.pageContentPlacehol: Describe what content should be on this page: Texts, images, functions, etc.
wizard.content.pages.pageCharacteristicP: Which features should be placed on this page? Should content suggestions be developed or should content be used exactly as specified?
wizard.content.formFields.title: Form fields
wizard.content.formFields.description: Since you have selected a contact form, define the desired fields and their labels here.
wizard.loading.title: Submitting project...
wizard.loading.description: Please wait while we process your project.
wizard.modals.error.title: Error submitting
wizard.modals.error.description: The following errors occurred when submitting your project:
wizard.modals.error.whatHappensDescripti: After closing this dialog, you will be redirected to step 1. Your entries will be retained so that you can fix the problem and try again.
wizard.modals.error.noPreUploaded: No pre-uploaded assets found, uploading now...
wizard.modals.error.customerLinkingFaile: Customer linking failed, but project was created:
wizard.modals.error.waiting: Waiting 3 seconds before publishing to ensure data consistency...
wizard.modals.error.noAssetsPublished: No assets could be published, but project was created and published
wizard.modals.error.networkError: Network error: Connection to server failed
wizard.modals.error.checkConnection: Please check your internet connection and try again.
wizard.modals.thankYou.title: Thank you!
wizard.modals.thankYou.subtitle: Your project has been submitted successfully
wizard.modals.thankYou.steps.step1: We review your request within 24 hours
wizard.modals.thankYou.steps.step2: You receive a detailed offer by email
wizard.modals.thankYou.steps.step3: We schedule an appointment for a personal conversation
wizard.modals.reset.title: Start over?
wizard.modals.reset.description: Do you really want to start over? All your previous entries will be lost.
wizard.form.targetAudiencePlaceholder: e.g. Small businesses, individuals, B2B customers...
wizard.form.goalsPlaceholder: e.g. Acquire more customers, digitize processes...
wizard.form.inspiration: Are there websites that can serve as inspiration?
wizard.form.customFeaturesPlaceholder: Describe additional special requirements that are not in the list...
wizard.form.placeholders.webApplication: Describe in detail the desired functions and features of your application: What main functions should it have? How should users interact with it? What data will be processed? Are there special requirements for performance or security?
wizard.form.placeholders.freestyle: Describe your individual project in detail: What problem should be solved? What specific requirements do you have? Which systems should be integrated? Which functions are particularly important?
wizard.form.placeholders.default: Describe your project in detail: What is the goal? What problems should it solve? Which target group are you addressing? Do you already have concrete ideas about design or functions?
wizard.navigation.register: Register to use the extended configurator
